code: import React from'react';import'../styles/Projects.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const statusClass={'In Progress':'status-active','Completed':'status-completed','Pending':'status-pending'};const Projects=()=>{const projects=[{id:1,title:'Project Alpha',deadline:'2023-12-01',status:'In Progress',progress:60},{id:2,title:'Project Beta',deadline:'2023-11-15',status:'Completed',progress:100},{id:3,title:'Project Gamma',deadline:'2023-10-30',status:'Pending',progress:20}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"projects-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"projects-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Deadline"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Status"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Progress"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:projects.map(project=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:project.deadline}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"project-status ".concat(statusClass[project.status]),children:project.status})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-bar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress",style:{width:"".concat(project.progress,"%")}})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"view-details",children:"View Details"})})]},project.id))})]})]});};export default Projects;
